pullrequest.title: Updates to self colliding collisions in atlas

content.raw:
This looks much better, but the legs are still drifting more than with ODE. To test with ros:

`roscd atlas_utils/scripts; vim run_gazebo`  add "-e bullet" to gazebo command

`roscd atlas; vim atlas.urdf` comment out <plugin filename="libAtlasPlugin"/> on line 1018.
content.html:
This looks much better, but the legs are still drifting more than with ODE. To test with ros:

roscd atlas_utils/scripts; vim run_gazebo add "-e bullet" to gazebo command

roscd atlas; vim atlas.urdf comment out <plugin filename="libAtlasPlugin"/> on line 1018.
